attributes.action: Ban On Celtic Football Club from British Television
attributes.additional_details: In light of Celtic Football Clubs continued refusal to deal with the Sectarian Songs, IRA Chants and Flags, Bloody Poppy banners, Anti British Forces Chants and the latest "Having a party when Gazza Dies" singing at their matches, CFC should be banned from British Television and not benefit financially from any British Media company, especially the BBC.

rejection.details: One for the broadcasting companies and media.
